name: BulletSnake
description:
BulletSnake is a scoring game loosely based on the classic game "Snake".  Like in the aforementioned classic game, move towards the food (blue) and eat it ! Once your snake eats the food, it will grow uncontrollably and speed up. Shoot a bullet at the (yellow) target to regain your normal speed and size.

One SnakeOne Bullet
One Target

Share your thoughts and your highest score!!
---------
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 - "Only One" 
---------
Controls:  Arrows        -   directions
                       Spacebar    -   shoot/select
